SYSTEM: PresntacionMLF-vFinal.pdf: Página 18
Initial and Future Work with the Easy-to-Read Methodology 
Understanding How the Easy-To-Read Methodology is used 
The E2R Methodology is used in the manual 
processes of  
adapting existing documents and  
producing new contents 
These processes are human resource consuming 
It is needed to involve people with cognitive disabilities as 
well as people with expert knowledge in E2R Methodology  
30
speaker: SYSTEM
